titleStmt.title: His Maiesties speech with Mr. Speakers speech to both Houses of Parliament, at the passing of the bill for tonnage and poundage : being an answer to Mr. Speakers speech at the presenting thereof, 22 June, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.)
"Mr. Speaker's speech" appears first on the sheet, and comprises most of the text.
William Lenthall (1591-1662) was speaker of the House of Commons -- cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
